name: The Birth of Blobby
description:
Join Blobby on his quest to reach the outdoors!  He'll lead the way, just let him know when to jump!  

Made in just over 24 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2018:  Genre without Mechanic

In this 2.5D platformer you've got one button, spacebar to jump.  Blobby is a simple creature, so he'll keep going until he hits a wall, at which point he'll just turn around and keep on moving.  Keep him safe until he can finally feel the sun!

All sounds are royalty free to use for either commercial or non-commercial purposes.  

SFX from: 

Noise for fun

Music loops from:

Looperman
